## Observable.addOnce() method

Create a new Observer with the specified callback and unregisters after the next notification

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addOnce(callback: (eventData: T, eventState: ObserverEventState) => void): null | Observer<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | <code>(eventData: T, eventState: ObserverEventState) =&gt; void</code> | the callback that will be executed for that Observer |

<b>Returns:</b>

`null | Observer<T>`

the new observer created for the callback
